body.text: Example.com is a Non-Profit Corporation and 501(c)(3) Charity. It is our mission to educate the public about underwater basket weaving. A majority of our revenue comes from annual memberships and the primary purpose of those memberships is to attend our annual convention. https://example.com/

faqs.answer: We don't actually send out paper tickets. We simply use our online database to verify your membership and payment. This helps to reduce costs. To verify that you are on the list, simply login to the site and make sure that your invoice ("My Account" > "My Purchases") is marked as paid.
faqs.question: When will I receive my ticket?

faqs.answer: The badge name is the name you’d like to be called while you are at the convention. It can be your full name, a nickname, an anime character’s name, your gaming handle, etc. Obscenity, vulgarity, and slurs regarding race, gender, or sexual preference, in any language, will not be tolerated. Please l
faqs.question: What is a badge name?

faqs.answer: Yes, you may change your badge name in your Underwater Basket Weaving Expo account under "Edit Account" until Registration prints your badge.
faqs.question: Can I change the name on my badge after I have purchased it?

faqs.answer: Your badge allows you admittance to all Underwater Basket Weaving Expo convention activities. It identifies you as a member to the convention and hotel staff. It must be worn visibly and above the waist at all times in convention areas.
faqs.question: Do I need to wear my badge?

faqs.answer: Yes, but be advised we may ask you to remove any masks if we need to check a photo ID against the real face. We also ask that you have your photo ID and/or your invoice out and ready for us when you step up to the Registration booth to expedite the process. Please avoid carrying large props in line.
faqs.question: Can I wear my costume while I’m in line?

faqs.answer: We do not offer refunds. However, if you contact us at reg@example.com before July 15th we can transfer your membership to someone else. Please see our Member Transfer FAQ for more information.
faqs.question: What is your refund policy?

faqs.answer:
Members who register by June 1st may request to have their badge mailed to them.  This is optional and must be requested using our online form by June 23rd.  Mailed badge requests will be mailed out on June 26th.

For more information go to this URL:
https://example.com/Register/FAQ/MailedBadges
faqs.question: Can I have my badge mailed to me?
